title: How Do I Delete Replay Files?

replies.body: Per the [Replays](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) guide, you should be able to find them in your Documents folder.  Sucks to see that a replay corrupt, though.  Replays are still in testing, so be sure to report any feedback to the devs over at the[ client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  I hope that helps!
